content: CFS-T wedge compression kits Wedge compression kit for quickly and easily forming a tight, effective seal within cable transit frames ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- - - ### FEATURES:Features Only one central bolt to be tightened Available with bolt and counter-plate in galvanized steel or stainless steel Applications Sealing penetrations in shipbuilding and offshore applications Sealing penetrations in wind power structures Telecom, data centers, downstream (oil and gas), petro-chemical, control rooms, health care, emergency power, transmission towers For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals: UL Temperature resistance range: -40 - 122 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Technical Data | Approvals | UL | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 122 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) ### ITEMS- 2047207 - Cable Transit Wedge Seal - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T WD120 60 S/S Wedge seal assy - 2014880 - CFS-T WD 120 GS wedge compr. kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 4x CFS-T AP GS Anchor plate assy - 1x CFS-T FAP GS Anchor plate assy - 1x CFS-T WD 120 60 GS Wedge seal assy - 1x Lubricant - 2014881 - CFS-T WD 120 S/S wedge compr. kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 4x CFS-T AP S/S Anchor plate assy - 1x CFS-T FAP S/S Anchor plate assy - 1x CFS-T WD120 60 S/S Wedge seal assy - 1x Lubricant
